name: Run!
description: !Run is an infinity runner created in 2019. The graphics are simple with the intentions of making the game run on any windows machine. The game is played by dodging a series of objects by either sliding with the "S" key, or jumping with the spacebar. While mid-air or lying on the ground, you can move yourself side by side by using the normal movement keys, bound to "A" & "D" by default. For every object your pass, you'll be rewarded with one point of score.
